--- title: "KIND network update" format: html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false message: false --- ```{=html} ``` ## Week beginning Mon 24th February 2025 Dear colleagues, Welcome to the regular KIND network update. We've got two community meetup sessions running this week, so look forward to seeing you at one or other of them. We're also starting the first session of our intermediate-level Excel training course, which is designed to help those with some prior Excel experience build and consolidate their skills. That's running 1.00-2.30pm Wednesdays over the next five weeks - please [follow this link](https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/839dc3a7-98a3-4610-a391-efc7615979fb@10efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a) to register for the first session. Hope to see you at something soon. Brendan --- ## Wins of The Week In the spirit of [#IAmRemarkable](https://www.rmrkblty.org/iamremarkable), we do a weekly wins of the week thread to celebrate the professional (and personal) achievements of the community: + After slight procrastination, I started on our new intranet page and it's almost completed, It's looking quite good although I say so myself + Took part in my first KIND training session on Power BI + Got several tricky reports finished (or at least off my desk for the moment). In non-work related things, successful soup-making experiments. (The curried butternut squash, sweet potato and lentil was particularly nice.) + I shared an idea I have had for a while that colleagues have responded well too and its gaining traction Well done all, and looking forward to [hearing your wins of the week](https://forms.office.com/e/8DgpNP6rcK) in future. --- ## Training sessions Click the link to book yourself into the session. `````{=html}
